TopicTitle: is there any any way to get a steam code if i've bought the game on the site?

Articles.Content: Before I got Steam, I bought KSP on the site. I could buy it again on Steam, but I was wondering if it were possible to get a Steam Code too, since I've already bought it on the site.
There is no way for you too get a steam key for your purchase on the website, you will have to buy the game again if you want to download it through steam.
